analysis.description:
CCPToken.refundTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0x00ec5112673b69bd5f545dc6a3bede8674f878eb.sol#400-413) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_refund,_value) (/unique_chucks/25/0x00ec5112673b69bd5f545dc6a3bede8674f878eb.sol#408)
